word:
The Lord calls upon His people in every State in America to come up to his help in the establishment of his work in Washington. Those who have this work in hand are to show no lack of interest in it. And our people are to remember that for the present the work in Washington is to be 


        Our First Interest. 

There are many kinds of work to be carried forward in different places; but our first interest just now is our work at the Capital of our Nation.
